title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; identical surface to the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama chat and embeddings as first-class LangChain components.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted WebUI for Ollama with chat history, RAG, user management and plugin store.

title: ollama4j – Java Client
summary: Lightweight Java/Kotlin library wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints; Android compatible.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli (rich TUI)
summary: Terminal dashboard for chatting, model management and performance metrics using rich text UI.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin turning Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline completion engine.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui (Flutter desktop)
summary: Cross-platform desktop client built in Flutter for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Experimental CLI that replicates OpenAI Codex flow using CodeLlama models via Ollama.

title: ollama-tools
summary: PyPI helper that auto-generates OpenAI-style function-calling schemas for Ollama chat completions.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for RAG, fine-tuning, Docker tricks, and hardware-optimised deployments.

title: reddit/r/ollama – weekly discussion
summary: Active subreddit for troubleshooting, model requests and sharing Ollama integrations.

title: Hacker News: Show HN – Ollama added tool use
summary: Discussion on Ollama’s new native function-calling support and ecosystem impact.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension that pipes selected code to Ollama for explain, refactor or doc generation.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module spinning up ephemeral Ollama services in CI pipelines for LLM-based testing or codegen.
